sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, Collapse, ProgressBar, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import avatar1 from "../../../assets/images/user/avatar-1.jpg"; import avatar2 from "../../../assets/images/user/avatar-2.jpg"; import avatar3 from "../../../assets/images/user/avatar-3.jpg"; const TaskBoard = () => { const [activateCollapse, setActivateCollapse] = useState([1, 2, 3]); const collapseHandler = (activeKey) => { if (activateCollapse.findIndex(item => item === activeKey) > -1) { setActivateCollapse(activateCollapse.filter(item => item !== parseInt(activeKey))); } else { setActivateCollapse([...activateCollapse, parseInt(activeKey)]); } }; return ( Search Box
collapseHandler(1)} aria-controls="completed-status"> Completed Status
item === 1) > -1)}>
Highest priority
High priority
Normal priority
Low priority
collapseHandler(2)} aria-controls="assign-users"> Assign Users
item === 2) > -1)}>
Josephin Doe

Santa Ana,CA

Josephin Doe

Huntingston, NJ

Josephin Doe

Willingstion, WA

Josephin Doe

Illions, IL

collapseHandler(3)} aria-controls="revision"> Revision
item === 3) > -1)}>
Drop the IE specific hacks for temporal inputs

4 minutes ago

Have Carousel ignore keyboard events

12 Dec,2015

Add full font overrides for popovers and tooltips

2 month ago

Responsive Asssignment

6 month ago
  • Filter: (current)
  • By Date Show all Today Yesterday This week This month This year
  • By Status Show all Open On hold Resolved Closed Duplicate Don't fix
  • By Priority Show all Highest High Normal Low
View Mode:
#24. Create UI design model 28 January, 2015 A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled. Due : 23 hours
Normal Highest priority High priority Normal priority Low priority Open Show all Open On hold Resolved Closed Duplicate Don't fix Check in Attach Screenshots Reassign Edit task Remove
